name: BatchFusionPrimer
short_description:
Returns forward and fusion primers for use in GFP fusion PCR reactions in C. elegans

40<GC%<60 {forward and reverse(minus GFP)}
52<TmdegC<68 {forward and reverse(minus GFP)}

Selects against repetitive sequence (tandem identical nucleotides) and selects against dinucleotide repeats 

Returns one self complementarity score for each forward primer and two for each fusion primer - selects against significant self complementarity 

User inputs the distance (in base pairs) from the 5' end to sample for forward primer, and also inputs the distance from the 3' end to sample for the fusion primer
 
User inputs desired forward primer length

User inputs whether GC clamp is desired

Returns primer positions within each sequence and enables primer design from multi sequence files in FASTA format 

Writes to screen and also an output file

Returns time (in secs) taken to run program

Dependancies: 
Bioperl 
Bio::SeqIO
summary: Returns forward and GFP fusion primers
